page.title: 02THE NEW SCHOOL EXTENSION.
page.content: Due to the{increased population}at {Holme Hall,}the{primary school}needs to be extended to{accomadate}an extra {180 children.}The{existing area}is {996 metres}the new{extension}will be {628 metres.}Today{5th June 1985}we are watching the{contractors}move in with a{digger (JCB)}and a{bulldozer.}Old {railway wagons}are used for storing {equipment.}There is a{portable office on the site.By{12th July,}a wall was being knocked down to start extending {the boiler house.The concrete chimney has already been taken down as it was {an eyesore. }It will be replaced by a {slimmer stainless steel}one.The {heating}of the school will continue to be provided by{solid fuel.The boiler {house}will be the first part to be completed. The whole extension should be completed in a year's time.
